Detailed Description

Abstract base class (i.e.

interface) for checks to be run during a regression test.

Check the condition expected.

Parameters:
msg - Message to be optionally set while checking.

Implemented in ModelFileValidCheck, ModelFileHeaderCheck, File5EquivalentCheck, test_regression_copynumber_cyto_quick, test_regression_copynumber_workflow_quick, DMET2MarkerCheck, DMET2HaplotypeCheck, DMET3TestCaseCheck, CalvinChpCheck, CelCheck, ChpCheck, CnchpCheck, CychpCheck, MatrixCheck, MixedFileCheck, and TextFileCheck.

bool RegressionCheck::checkFloat ( float  gold,
float  gen,
double  eps,
bool &  success,
double &  maxDiff,
bool  log = false,
double  frac = 0 
) [inline, protected]

Are two floats within epsilon (small value) of eachother?

Parameters:
gold - correct value.
gen - value to be tested.
eps - epsilon, small number they can be different but still equivalent. i.e. if |generated-gold| >= eps then there is a difference.
success - boolean set to false if floats not equivalent.
maxDiff - Maximum difference seen so far.
log - boolean set to true if differences to be reported.
frac - Maximum accepted fractional difference in numeric values (not used by default). i.e. if |generated-gold| >= frac*max(|generated|,|gold|) then there is a difference.
Returns:
- true if floats equivalent, false otherwise.
